snippet.title: Battle for Vega, The: Official Trailer 1
snippet.description:
And updated and expanded version of the trailer for our retro-inspired shooter -  The Battle for Vega. Includes all updates made so,  and all the requests made from all our beta testers.

The official demo it's up on Steam right now, check it out:
https://s.team/a/2409010

The Battle for Vega is inspired by the classic Space Invaders, and takes the old-school gameplay you know and love and adds new features that make it a fresh and exciting experience.

The game has planned release by the end of the year for PC (Steam), if you want to see for yourself there is an official demo on Steam at this moment.

Official Steam Page:
https://s.team/a/2409010

Official Discord Channel:
https://discord.gg/avhDncE2cT

Official Web Page:
https://battleforvega.com/

Copyrights:
* Music by DoMiSol Music
* Santello font designed by Aleksei Poteichuk
